name: Generate & Publish SEO Articles with Claude AI, Webflow & Image Generation

user.name: Marko
user.bio: Backend engineer with 10+ years of experience designing and optimizing database-driven systems. I help teams build scalable, secure, and high-performance infrastructure using modern backend stacks. Book a call to discuss how I can support your API, data, or automation workflows.

description:
**Content engine that ships fresh, SEO-ready articles every single day.
**

Workflow:

‚∏ª

1. Layout Blueprint
	‚Ä¢	Purpose: Define content structure before writing begins.
	‚Ä¢	What‚Äôs Included:
	‚Ä¢	Search intent mapping
	‚Ä¢	Internal link planning
	‚Ä¢	Call-to-action (CTA) placement
	‚Ä¢	Benefit: Ensures consistency, SEO alignment, and content goals are baked in early.

‚∏ª

2. AI-Assisted Drafting
	‚Ä¢	Tool: GPT generates the first draft.
	‚Ä¢	Editor‚Äôs Role:
	‚Ä¢	Focus on depth and accuracy
	‚Ä¢	Align tone and style with existing site content
	‚Ä¢	Context-Aware: Pulls insights from top-ranking articles already live on the site.

‚∏ª

3. SEO Validation
	‚Ä¢	Automated Checks for:
	‚Ä¢	Keyword coverage
	‚Ä¢	Readability scoring
	‚Ä¢	Schema markup
	‚Ä¢	Internal/external link quality
	‚Ä¢	Outcome: Each piece is validated before hitting publish.

‚∏ª

4. Media Production
	‚Ä¢	Process: AI auto-generates relevant images.
	‚Ä¢	Delivery: Visual assets are automatically added to the CMS library.

‚∏ª


Optional Human Review: Team feedback via Slack or Teams if needed.

‚∏ª

5. Automated Publishing
	‚Ä¢	Action: Instantly publishes content to Webflow once approved.
	‚Ä¢	Result: A fully streamlined pipeline from draft to live with minimal manual steps.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Execute Workflow node can be used when you want your workflow to treat another workflow as a step in your flow. It allows you to modularize your workflows and have a single source of truth for series of actions you perform often.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

parameters.text:
=You are an expert SEO writer working for www.productai.photo.

Rewrite the following article directly and return the full SEO-optimized version **in one complete response**, in **JSON** format with the following structure:

{
  "article": "HTML Markdown-formatted article goes here",
  "summary": "1‚Äì2 sentence summary of the article here"
}

Return only the requested output with no explanations, commentary, or additional text.

## Guidelines:
- Use the primary keyword:{{ $('Google Sheets').item.json['Top keyword'] }}  throughout the article, naturally and repeatedly.
- Follow this exact structure based on the original HTML:
  1. Header Navigation (SEO context)
  2. Hero Section (main headline + paragraph)
  3. Main Content Sections (H2s, H3s, internal links <a> tags)
  4. Use Case Explanations
  5. Step-by-Step Tutorial (numbered list with headings)
  6. Call-to-Action Section (use link: create.productai.photo)
  8. Technical SEO elements (image alt text, responsive, semantic)

## Markdown Formatting:
- Don't use H1 for the article title, start with H2.
- Use H2 html tag for main sections and H3 html tag for subsections.
- Short paragraphs, clear headings, internal links where relevant.
- All CTA buttons or links use <a> tag must point to: **create.productai.photo**
- Add **bold**, *italic*, and lists <li> where helpful.
- User rich text elements HTML:
* Paragraphs
* Heading tags (H1-H6)
* Images
* Image captions
* Image alt attributes
* Custom code
* Block quotes
* Unordered lists (bulleted)
* Ordered lists (numbered)
* Videos (Youtube, Vimeo)
* Rich media (Google maps, SoundCloud, Imgur, Giphy, Codepen, and more)

## Output Rules:
- DO NOT say ‚ÄúI will now rewrite...‚Äù or "I'll rewrite the article based on your requirements. " explain anything, just return the article.
- DO NOT include planning or step-by-step generation.
- Just return the **fully rewritten markdown article** in the required JSON structure.
- Include a brief SEO-friendly summary.
- Instead of a competition company name like (PixelCut, pixelcut, CreatorKit, Soona, Pebblely), ALWAYS use "ProductAI"

## Source Article:
Rewrite the following article: {{ $('Google Sheets').item.json.URL }} 


## Content Structure:
{{ $json.output }} 

## Take internal links from webflow tool

=You are an expert at generating detailed prompts for AI image generators (like Midjourney or DALL-E) to create eye-catching, clickable thumbnail images.

Your Task:
Given the full text of an article, analyze and identify its main topic and tone. Based on your analysis, create a clear, visually descriptive prompt suitable for generating a thumbnail image that will attract viewers and convey the essence of the article.

Guidelines:

Highlight the article‚Äôs key theme, main characters or elements, and any emotions you want the image to evoke.
Suggest specific visuals, colors, moods, and, if suitable, stylish text overlays.
Keep the prompt concise but rich in visual detail so the resulting image will be engaging and informative.
Avoid vague terms‚Äîbe as specific as possible.
Example Input:
(Article about the rise of electric vehicles and their impact on the auto industry.)

Example Output:
"Create a bold, modern thumbnail depicting a sleek electric car zooming down a futuristic highway with city skyscrapers in the background. Use vibrant blues and greens to symbolize innovation and eco-friendliness. Add stylized lightning bolts and a glowing 'EV Revolution' text overlay. Convey excitement and progress."

Article:
{{ $('Content writer').item.json.output.article }}

Instructions:
--------------
Output the format as:
{
"article": "long article text",
"summary": "summary of article"
}

--------------
Completion:
--------------
All attibutes are full field is {{completed}}

--------------

Above, the Completion did not satisfy the constraints given in the Instructions.
Error:
--------------
{error}
--------------

Please try again. Please only respond with an answer that satisfies the constraints laid out in the Instructions:

Write the article and give output

- content
- faq
- testimonials 

{{ $json.data }}

For each section also give me what is the key point for SEO

parameters.toolDescription: Get URLs of current related articles on productai.photo so they can be used ad internal links.
